name: Super Stupid Game
description:
The total number of downloads for the smartphone app version has exceeded 20,000!
The ultimate low budget stupid game that has created a big topic in Japan, the PC version of "Super Stupid Game" is finally here!

Paper-like characters rampage!
Make full use of each character's special skill to defeat the enemy!

◆ Features of this game
・ You can play at no extra charge!
Play a lot and open a lot of loot boxes!

・ Loot box system
You can get a character by consuming the items collected in the game and opening the loot box!

· Special Skill
There is a special skill for all characters with a rarity of 2 or higher!
Let's aim to clear the stage by making the best use of the characteristics of each character!

・ Equipment Card
If you clear the stage, you will occasionally get an equipment card that can strengthen your character!
Clear the stage and get a powerful equipment card!

・ Legendary Tower (for streamers)
We also have a stage that seems to be a stupid game that "cannot be cleared by ordinary people"!
Clear all stages and aim for the Stupid Game Master!


◆ Game overview
・ Language: English, Japanese

・Game streaming is welcome! There are no particular restrictions.

・ Even with compatible versions, you may not be able to play the game normally due to model specifications. In such a case, please follow the refund procedure specified by Steam.
